name: Slack Inspirational Quotes.
description: A Bot to retrieve an inspirational quote or post and inspiration quote once per day.

SLACK_POSTINGWEBHOOK.description: Array of Incoming Webhook URL of Slack to Post Quotes via a Schedule.

SLACK_INCOMINGTOKEN.description: Array of Outgoing Webhook Tokens from Slack to Serve up Inspirational Quotes on Demand.
